meaning: Strength in beginnings, the warrior's path unfolds.
proverbs: The blade that cuts first wins the battle.
The warrior’s journey begins with a single step.
verses: [translate:Ogunda Meji] speaks of the forge where courage and justice are shaped.
Prepare yourself to face challenges with wisdom and strength.

meaning: Immortality, spiritual protection, blessings of longevity.
proverbs: Mountains do not perish; their strength endures.
Spiritual shields guard the faithful.
verses: [translate:Ogunda Oyeku] teaches the blessing of safe journeys and protection from premature death.
With faithful sacrifice, prosperity and longevity are assured.

meaning: Harnessing strength through insight and reflection.
proverbs: The sharpest sword is tempered by wisdom.
Reflection forges the strongest character.
verses: [translate:Ogunda Iwori] encourages thoughtful strength to overcome any obstacle.
Use insight and courage to carve your path.

meaning: Defense and protection through formidable strength.
proverbs: A warrior without shield is a fool.
Protection is strength’s silent ally.
verses: [translate:Ogunda Odi] counsels balance between offense and defense.
Guard your spirit as you advance.

proverbs: He who heals wounds mends battles.
Ancestral spirits lend power and protection.
verses: [translate:Ogunda Irosun] promotes renewal through ancestral guidance.
Draw strength from your roots to face the future.

proverbs: The river changes course swiftly and surely.
Flexibility is strength in disguise.
verses: [translate:Ogunda Owonrin] teaches that quick thinking saves the warrior.
Adapt and overcome the shifting tides.

proverbs: Courage is the spark of all victories.
Action turns dreams into reality.
verses: [translate:Ogunda Obara] urges decisive and courageous steps forward.
Harness your energy to break through barriers.

meaning: Overcoming adversity through inner strength and caution.
proverbs: Steadfastness battles the fiercest storms.
Resilient spirits rise after every fall.
verses: [translate:Ogunda Okanran] teaches resilience and carefulness amidst trials.
Stand firm; let no conflict break your resolve.

proverbs: The iron that forges is unbreakable.
Mighty is the hand that creates order.
verses: [translate:Ogunda Ogunda] embodies the spirit of creation and destruction.
Harness your core power for lasting success.

proverbs: Not all dangers roar loudly.
Wisdom is vigilance in the shadows.
verses: [translate:Ogunda Osa] guides cautious steps through unseen trials.
Listen to the silence that warns.

proverbs: Discipline is the fortress of the soul.
Control within wards off chaos without.
verses: [translate:Ogunda Ika] teaches that inner mastery is the greatest armor.
Channel strength through self-restraint.

proverbs: The tree sheds old leaves for new growth.
Endurance is the pulse of life’s cycles.
verses: [translate:Ogunda Oturupón] affirms continual renewal and resilience.
Embrace change as the source of strength.

proverbs: Healing flows through the spirit’s path.
Guidance lights the darkest roads.
verses: [translate:Ogunda Otura] nurtures the soul’s healing journey.
Trust the spirit to lead to wholeness.

proverbs: Prosperity is born in the fertile ground of wisdom.
The strongest oak grows from the deepest roots.
verses: [translate:Ogunda Irete] teaches abundance through balance and spiritual integrity.
Let your prosperity serve your greater purpose.

proverbs: Cleansing clears the way for growth.
Healing renews the warrior.
verses: [translate:Ogunda Ose] offers renewal through spiritual cleansing.
Let go of burdens to embrace new strength.

proverbs: Clear vision brings destiny into focus.
Fortitude completes the journey.
verses: [translate:Ogunda Ofun] affirms the power of clarity in overcoming challenges.
Stand firm in truth and purpose.
